results.content: I realized at the beginning that this course was designed to give only a foundational knowledge of JS. I am taking other courses on JS as well. I like this course because the perspective of the instructor gives me more insight into the language. The instructor introduced additional concepts and functionality that I did not get in other JS courses. For me, it was well worth my time.

response.content: Thanks Phillip , I'm glad you found it useful.
response.content_html: Thanks Phillip , I'm glad you found it useful.

results.content: The instructor navigates like season teacher.

This is exactly what I wanted from my favorite professor from Udemy. I would recommend the professor to everyone because even when a course is over he is always ready to answer (though not necessarily) a question and suggestion. I am very happy to have found a professor on the Udemy site.Thank you endlessly.Sorry for my poor English.
